article_title: Republican presidential candidate John Kasich visits the region

og.description: On a tour of the Monadnock Region Friday, Republican presidential candidate John Kasich cut right to the heart of an issue that resonated with a lot of employees at Smiths Medical in Keene: taxes.
og.title: Republican presidential candidate John Kasich visits the region
